To start the slide process:

```{r slidefy_w1, results='markup', echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
library(slidify)
library(rCharts)

author('ch13')#corr and regression

#to generate the slides:

slidify("index.RMD")

browseURL("index.html")

#to publish
publish(title = 'mytitle', 'index.html', host = 'rpubs')
```
